column2: an A.M. Eatery////I got the french toast
column4: but not better than most of the other french toast I've had in my life. The bread was soft and thick
column5: and it had strawberries and marscapone on top. The marscapone was incredible! Still
column6: it wasn't the kind of breakfast you wait an hour for
column7: so I'm glad I came at a time there wasn't a wait. The coffee was really good
column9: and served in a very generously sized mug
